title: Zong hits 7 bln monthly recharge milestone through alternate channels
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 11 (APP):Zong proudly celebrated a significant milestone in its journey of digital innovation as the company achieves a remarkable 7 billion recharge from its Alternate Channels.
According to a news release, this achievement is a testament to the continued dedication, strategic vision, and growth of Zong’s digital initiatives over the years.
Alternate Channels are secondary and tertiary recharge platforms like Banking apps, FinTech apps websites. Team Zong celebrated this milestone at Zong HQ, inaugurated by Wasi Ansari, Director of Sales & Distribution. Zong’s C-level Leadership, Directors, and HOD were presented with insights on the journey of the Alternate Channel transformation, which was launched in the year 2017.
During his address, Ansari highlighted the vision of Zong 4G to become a leader in digital innovation.
“Over the past seven years, the Alternate Channel has grown exponentially, now holding a 40% volume share in total recharge volume and delivering a YTD growth of 29.81% this year. The 7 billion volume achievement is a proud moment for the company, reflecting its strong commitment to innovation, partner engagement, and expansion in the digital landscape” he reported.
